text: The 2023 Heart of America 200 was the 8th stock car race of the 2023 NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series, and the 23rd version of the event. The race was held on Saturday, May 6, 2023, in Kansas City, Kansas at Kansas Speedway. It was on a permanent tri-oval shaped racetrack. The race took 134 laps to finish. Grant Enfinger, driving for GMS Racing, would win in his first of the season. ==References== Category:May 2023 events
title: 2023 Heart of America 200
